text:

streaming to browser. It's running on the WebLogic Server 6.1.

creator: tkyjak@csas.cz
j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
This could be a multithreading problem as well as bugs in the FO or other
sources, or even MT problems caused by the JVM (not directly related to FOP)
Without a testcease, it's hard to tell.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
